details.title: UDF protests against police action against devotees, Sec 144 imposition at Sabarimala
details.content: The Congress-led UDF in Kerala staged a sit-in protest today after the police stopped them in Nilakkal for violating prohibitory orders.

details.title: KJ Alphons slammed Kerala govt for turning shrine into 'war zone'
details.content: The minister said: "The state government has turned the temple complex into a war zone. The devotees are not militants, they are pilgrims."

details.title: Kerala CM justifies police action in Sabarimala
details.content: "They were not Ayyappa devotees. RSS workers were camping at Sannidhanam with a motive to create trouble. The government cannot let anyone create trouble at Sabarimala," the chief minister said on Monday.

details.title: UDF en route to Pampa
details.content: UDF leaders and workers proceed to Pamba on a KSRTC bus from Nilakkal, reports Manorama News.
